forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 59F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 54F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
